name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
schedule:
Week 1 (9/10)  Course Introduction 
Week 2 (9/17) Paragraph Structure 
Week 3 (9/24) Holiday-No Class
Week 4 (10/1) Unity and Coherence
Week 5 (10/8) Using Outside Resources / Term Project Discussion (I)
Week 6 (10/15) From Paragraph to Essay
Week 7 (10/22) Process Essays 
Week 8 (10/29) In-text Citation & References / Term Project Discussion (II)
Week 9 (11/5) Cause/Effect Essays (I) 
Week 10 (11/12) Cause/Effect Essays (II)
Week 11 (11/19) Comparison/Contrast Essays / Term Project Discussion (III)
Week 12 (11/26) Argumentative Essays (I)
Week 13 (12/3) Argumentative Essays (II)
Week 14 (12/10) Term Project Presentation (I)
Week 15 (12/17) Term Project Presentation (II)
Week 16 (12/24) Recapitulation & Review
Week 17 (12/31) Flexible Holiday-No Class 
Week 18 (1/7) Final Exam
scorePolicy:
AWL Quizzes: 20%
Essays: 20%
Term Project: 40%
Final Exam: 20%
materials:
Oshima, A., & Hogue, A. 2014. Longman Academic Writing Series: Essays (5th ed.). New York: Pearson Education.

Coxhead, Averil. 2000. A new academic word list. TESOL Quarterly 34: 213-238.
